name: py-configparser
description:
This library brings the updated configparser from Python 3.5 to Python
2.6-3.5.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ordereddict
dependencies.description:
A drop-in substitute for Py2.7's new collections. OrderedDict that works
in Python 2.4-2.6.

dependent_to.name: lbann
dependent_to.description:
LBANN: Livermore Big Artificial Neural Network Toolkit. A distributed
memory, HPC-optimized, model and data parallel training toolkit for deep
neural networks.

dependent_to.name: aws-parallelcluster
dependent_to.description:
AWS ParallelCluster is an AWS supported Open Source cluster management
tool to deploy and manage HPC clusters in the AWS cloud.

dependent_to.name: py-wandb
dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.

dependent_to.name: py-entrypoints
dependent_to.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependent_to.name: py-flake8
dependent_to.description:
Flake8 is a wrapper around PyFlakes, pep8 and Ned Batchelder's McCabe
script.
